name: Pickaxe Shark
description:
## Pickaxe Shark

Equip yourself with this trusty pickaxe fashioned like a shark, ready for farming adventures.

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
